article_title: US security adviser urges Netanyahu to connect war to 'political strategy'
sentence: Israel  launched  a  military  campaign  in  Gaza  to  destroy  Hamas  in  response  to  the  group's  attack  on  southern  Israel  last  year,  during  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  252  others  were  taken  hostage.
